name: Academy of Aviation
about: Academy of Aviation is a leading flight training institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. With a focus on safety, innovation, and accessibility, we offer a range of programs including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Single and Multi-Engine certifications. Our solution-based training is designed to make students top candidates for professional pilot careers, emphasizing high-hour pilots, multi-engine experience, and additional ratings. We have international admissions representatives and offer full financing options for our career pilot programs. With accreditation candidacy from the Middle States Association and a commitment to continuous improvement, Academy of Aviation ensures students receive the finest training to achieve their aviation goals. Join us to become a skilled and confident pilot.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
